channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta to Put Ads on WhatsApp, Offer Paid Subscriptions
Wisconsin dairy farmer sues Trump administration claiming discrimination against white farmers
NWS: Tornado touched down in Evansville during torrential rainstorm
Flight to nowhere for 214 passengers on a British Airways Boeing 787 bound for India
How the humble water gun became the symbol of Barcelona's anti-tourism movement
Air India flight returns to Hong Kong due to a midair technical issue
item.description: An Air India flight has returned to Hong Kong shortly after takeoff due to a midair technical issue

item.title: 6/16: CBS Morning News
item.description: Suspect in Minnesota lawmakers' shootings is captured; Pacers and Thunder face off in Game 5 of NBA Finals in Oklahoma City.

item.title: May 12: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: President Trump aims to lower prescription costs with new executive order; Pope Leo XIV gives first address to media, calls freedom of the press a "pr...

item.title: Juror dismissed in Sean "Diddy" Combs trial
item.description: The judge in the Sean "Diddy" Combs sex trafficking and racketeering trial in NYC dismissed one of the jurors Monday.

item.title: WhatsApp to bring subscription model and ads to messaging platform
item.description: WhatsApp is rolling out new ad features including a subscription model that will allow channels to offer exclusive content for a monthly fee.

item.title: Minnesota lawmakers shooting suspect Vance Boelter due in court Monday
item.description: The man suspected of shooting and killing a Minnesota lawmaker and her husband and shooting and wounding a second lawmaker and his wife is due in cour...

item.title: WATCH: Woman wins award impersonating a pigeon
item.description: British artist Miriam Abrahams spent four weeks building her costume and took the prize at Pigeon Fest in New York City.

item.title: WATCH: Trump announced presidential run 10 years ago today
item.description: In 2015, Donald Trump was the 12th Republican to announce his candidacy after descending a golden escalator at Trump Tower in New York.

item.title: WATCH: Flash floods destroy homes and wash away roads in West Virginia
item.description: There is a state of emergency in West Virgina where at least three people are dead and several missing from flash flooding Saturday night.

item.title: Man suspected of shooting 2 Minnesota lawmakers charged with murder after surrendering to police

item.title: Minnesota lawmaker shootings suspect to make first court appearance

item.title: A teenager with a job making burritos became a powerful Minnesota lawmaker who trained service dogs
Friends say Minnesota shooting suspect was deeply religious and conservative
